subject: Friendly Reminder: Affiliate Payment
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Affiliate Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I would like to kindly ask about my affiliate payment. Could you please let
me know when it will be issued?

Thank you very much for your support. I look forward to your reply.

Best regards,

David Long

conversations.body_text: Hi David Long,    We will settle accounts at the beginning of the month, and commissions will be paid out on the 3rd.

Dear Simsonn Affiliate Team,

I hope you are doing well.

As mentioned in your previous email, commissions are scheduled to be paid
out on the 3rd of each month. Since today is already the 5th, may I kindly
ask if my commission payment has been processed yet?

Thank you very much for your kind support, and I truly appreciate your
assistance.

Warm regards,
David Long
